thread.title_full: Great hotel - great value and central location in mid-town! - Review of The Bryant Park Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: jillwU5630VZ
title: Great hotel - great value and central location in mid-town!
text: I have stayed at the Bryant Park Hotel at least half a dozen times and it's consistently one of my favorites. The service is great, it's super clean, well-located and room service is very speedy. It has an intimate feel but all the services of a larger hotel. An easy walk to Grand Central and not far from Penn Station either.
